img.alt: Video: Happy Earth Day from the Science Department
img.title: Video: Happy Earth Day from the Science Department
img.a: Video: Happy Earth Day from the Science Department

span.a: Video: Happy Earth Day from the Science Department

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-32791 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-columbia category-district

img.alt: Things to Do On Earth Day

h2.a: Things to Do On Earth Day

div.p: Columbia High School’s Students for Environmental Action club provide a list of things you can do to celebrate Earth Day. Happy Earth Day!

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-32768 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-bell-top category-columbia category-district category-genet category-goff category-green-meadow category-red-mill category-sutherland

img.alt: Yankee Trails Hope Bus Coming to East Greenbush

h2.a: Yankee Trails Hope Bus Coming to East Greenbush

div.p: On Thursday, April 23, be on the lookout for the #YTHopeBus, “Lightning McQeen” and “Waldo” as they take to the roads throughout the Town of East Greenbush, between 9:30 a.m. and 4 p.m.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-32765 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-columbia category-district category-goff

div.p: Mathematics teachers from throughout the East Greenbush Central School District send a special message to students with this fun Calculator Pass video. Enjoy!

p.img:
29 Englewood Avenue
East Greenbush, NY 12061
518.207.2500
Jeffrey P. Simons
District Superintendent
